Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameBoard
public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the gameboard used to play Santorini. The gamebord is composed by a 5x5 matrix of towerCells.

    private TowerCell[][] towerCells

      private final TowerCell[][] towerCells

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard()
      Builds the gameboard. Every "square" is associated with a towerCell object. Sets athenaPowerActive to "false"

  • Method Details

    • getTowerCell

      public TowerCell getTowerCell​(int x, int y)

    • cantBeForcedBackwards

      public boolean cantBeForcedBackwards​(int playerX, int playerY, int enemyX, int enemyY)
      This method checks if the worker can force backwards the enemy
      Parameters:
      playerX - worker's current-position's x
      playerY - worker's current-position's y
      enemyX - enemy's current-position's x
      enemyY - enemy's current-position's y
      Returns:
      boolean

    • generateBoard

      public void generateBoard​(int[][] towers)
      generates a board. Only for testing purpose
      Parameters:
      towers - a matrix representing a board. Integer represents towerLevel
